hedline.hl1: Drug Brand Names Y.& R. Advertising

abstract.p: Hoffmann-La Roche Inc, part of Roche Holding, names Young & Rubicam Advertising to handle account for Xenical weight-loss drug; billings estimated at $80 million (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: Hoffman-La Roche Inc., part of Roche Holding, yesterday named Young & Rubicam Advertising in New York to handle the account for its Xenical weight-loss drug. Billings were estimated at $80 million.

The decision came after a 10-week review that had been narrowed to Y.& R. Advertising and two other finalists in New York: Jordan McGrath Case & Partners/Euro RSCG, part of the Euro RSCG Worldwide unit of Havas Advertising, and Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide, part of the WPP Group.
Hoffman-La Roche Inc., part of Roche Holding, yesterday named Young & Rubicam Advertising in New York to handle the account for its Xenical weight-loss drug. Billings were estimated at $80 million.

The decision came after a 10-week review that had been narrowed to Y.& R. Advertising and two other finalists in New York: Jordan McGrath Case & Partners/Euro RSCG, part of the Euro RSCG Worldwide unit of Havas Advertising, and Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide, part of the WPP Group.

The Xenical account had been handled by divisions of the Lowe Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies, which parted ways with Hoffman-La Roche in April. They were Lowe Consumer Healthcare, for campaigns aimed at consumers, and Lowe McAdams Healthcare, for campaigns aimed at doctors.
